hookReason: Posts the latest world records of the game in the given channel

helpWithChannel.en-US: I post the latest world records of the game in $<channelMention>
helpWithChannel.fr: Je poste les derniers records du monde du jeu dans $<channelMention>
helpWithChannel.pt-BR: Eu posto os recordes mundiais mais recentes do jogo em $<channelMention>

helpWithoutChannel.en-US: I post the latest world records of the game
helpWithoutChannel.fr: Je poste les derniers records du monde du jeu
helpWithoutChannel.pt-BR: Eu posto os recordes mundiais mais recentes do jogo
